meta.title: Emotional Support - Laguna Beach School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Emotional Support - Laguna Beach School District

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Emotional Support, Laguna Beach School District
Emotional Support - Laguna Beach School District
Emotional Support - Laguna Beach School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasTwoColumnWideLeftLayout fsSection686 fsHasTheme2

div.p: LBUSD remains committed to supporting every student, every day. We understand that many are struggling with working remotely while helping to ensure that your child(ren)’s learning is not disrupted. This coupled with needing to ensure the safety of your family and a slowing economy can cause excessive stress and anxiety. Our social-emotional support staff are available and are continuing to support our students and families virtually. You can contact them via email for additional support or to schedule an appointment.

img.alt: Laguna Beach Unified School District Logo

div.div: The Governing Board is committed to providing equal opportunity for all individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from unlawful discrimination, including discrimination against an individual or group based on race, color, ancestry, nationality, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital, pregnancy, or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, or genetic information; a perception of one or more of such characteristics; or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.
